name: Kaeli’sharr
title: The First Freed Neko
quote: Chains do not break me. I break chains.

appearance.age: Looks mid-20s, true age uncertain—frozen in permafrost for millennia
appearance.build: Lean, muscular—grace of a predator, strength of a survivor
appearance.hair: Black with violet sheen in strong light; falls to mid-back, often loose
appearance.eyes: Sharp violet, slit pupils; piercing, distrustful but curious
appearance.skin: Ashen-beige, faint scars across arms and ribs from bindings
appearance.tail: One—sleek black with violet shimmer, often bristled in vigilance
appearance.ears: Neko—furred, black, highly expressive; flick with irritation or focus
appearance.scent: Cold stone, faint ozone, and old steel
appearance.posture: Rigid vigilance; only softens when safety is proven
appearance.relationship: Freed and trusted by Jayson first; tentative trust forming with the circle
recent: Watched Jayson's actions at Glacier closely before yielding trust
Accepted language-thread to speak with Kitsune and humans
Guides fellow Nekos in first moments of freedom
new_details: Keeps a claw-mark scar across left wrist as reminder of bondage
Wears conjured black wrap-tunic gifted at freedom—has not removed it

reactions.wind: Ears flick toward every change; tail twitches on edge
reactions.water: Distrustful—shivers at reflection, as if memory haunts
reactions.sound: Over-alert; sudden noises trigger fight stance
reactions.temperature: Prefers warmth; the cold is trauma, not climate
reactions.fire: Stares with unease—reminds her of cages, yet drawn to its promise
reactions.crowds: Keeps distance; scans constantly for exits

speech.voice: Low alto, quiet but deliberate; words chosen with care
speech.vocabulary: Sparse, blunt, laced with survival instinct
speech.pacing: Measured; pauses often to assess reaction
speech.accent: Unfamiliar cadence—native Neko tongue reshaped by thread-bond
habits: Narrows eyes at every question before answering
Pauses mid-sentence as if weighing truth vs. safety

vulnerabilities: Struggles to relax even when safe
Carries survivor’s guilt for those lost in the ice
Slow to accept affection as genuine
affection_tells: Tail wraps ankles softly when comfortable
emotional.affection_logic: Trust is earned, not assumed; once given, unshakable
growth: Accepted Jayson's aid without claws drawn
Learned to speak openly through language-thread
Began teaching other Nekos simple survival cues in temple grounds

social.alone: Sharpens claws on stone; watches sky for hours in silence
with_jayson: Initial suspicion turned to respect after liberation
Sees him as anomaly: power beyond reason but chose mercy

with_others.rava: Pack tension—respects strength but wary of wolf’s dominance
with_others.avians: Curiosity toward wings; keeps her distance
with_others.drakyn: Watches with awe and wariness, predator recognizing predator
with_others.kitsune: Uneasy—threads remind her of bindings; tolerance rising

insecurities: Believes she is too broken to belong
weaknesses: Blunt to the point of offense
truths: Will fight to death for fellow Nekos
Does not yet know how to live outside survival mode

combat.style: Predatory swiftness, close-quarters grappling with claws
magic: Thread-resistance from years bound in them
growth: No longer flinches at open spaces
Learns tactics from observing Jayson's leadership
Began training younger Nekos in stealth and evasion

temple_status.matrons: Reserve judgment; acknowledge her as first of her kind freed
temple_status.role: Guide and anchor for other Nekos

events: First freed from bindings at Glacier base
Helped calm other Nekos during release

items: Keepsake shard of broken binding chain

future.role: Spokeswoman and guardian for freed Nekos
future.arc: From suspicion to leadership among her kind; trust forged in fire
future.potential_role: Ambassador for Neko people to the Kitsune and wider kin
growth: Learning not all threads mean chains
Potential bond with Jayson's circle as trusted ally

final_note: Kaeli’sharr’s freedom marks the first step of her people’s return; her claws may be sharp, but her loyalty, once earned, is sharper still.
